source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenic video presents a daytime view of the Doge's Palace and St. Mark's Campanile in Venice, Italy, as seen from the water. The camera pans across the bustling waterfront. Boats can be seen moving on the canal.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: it shouldnt be" pans across", but the camera performs a counterclockwise arc
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The description should specify that the camera performs a counterclockwise arc rather than simply stating it "pans across."
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The description should specify that the camera performs a counterclockwise arc rather than simply stating it "pans across."
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This scenic video presents a daytime view of the Doge's Palace and St. Mark's Campanile in Venice, Italy, as seen from the water. The camera performs a counterclockwise arc across the bustling waterfront. Boats can be seen moving on the canal.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenic video presents a daytime view of the Doge's Palace and St. Mark's Campanile in Venice, Italy, as seen from the water. The camera performs a counterclockwise arc across the bustling waterfront. Boats can be seen moving on the canal.

generated_critique: The caption inaccurately describes the camera's movement as a "counterclockwise arc" when it is a pan to the left. The description of the boats' motion is too generic, stating "Boats can be seen moving on the canal." This fails to describe the specific action of the most salient moving subject, a white motorboat that travels from right to left across the water. The caption should be revised to accurately describe the camera's pan and the specific motion of the motorboat.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This scenic video presents a daytime view of the Doge's Palace in Venice, Italy, as seen from the water. The camera pans to the left, revealing St. Mark's Campanile, as a white motorboat travels from right to left across the canal.
